title: 820-3462 power issues.
message:
i've got this 820-3462 here that originally did not recognize the battery after liquid damage. After trying a different battery no more green light on charger. checked pp3v42 is present but no CHGR_ACOK. Checked  U7000 for CHGR_ACIN, CHGR_CIN, SMC_RESET_L, PP5V1_CHGR_VDD all are present with no short to ground on CHGR_ACOK. Im guessing some how the untested battery i plugged in may have cooked the U7000 somehow.

any suggestions?

title: 820-3462 power issues.
message: First check voltage on DCIN pin. If ok replace ISL

title: 820-3462 power issues.
message: Yep DCIN was ok. Replaced the ISL, everything working great. still had battery issue until i poked around on the battery board and all the sudden i got correct battery info and charging . Ty for the help.

title: 820-3462 power issues.
message: is there anything that can be done about this machine failing the ASD for memory errors? It boots in to OS X and seems to run just fine.

title: 820-3462 power issues.
message: ill have to run ASD again and take some pics of them

title: 820-3462 power issues.
message:
It fails for the following-
memory test9- mp memory test (data match failed)
memory test 60- mp block checkerboard test (data match failed)
memory test 61- mp bit checkerboard test (data match failed)
memory test 62- mp sequential byte block test (data match failed)
memory test 63- mp walking ones test (data match failed)
memory test 64- mp walking zeros test (data match failed)
memory test 65- mp walking spread bits test (data match failed)
memory test 66- mp walking bit flip test (data match failed)

title: 820-3462 power issues.
message: Could be corrosion under RAM/CPU. Or just give back and hope it doesn't come back.

title: 820-3462 power issues.
message: Lol was one i got for 200.00 so maybe ill just stick it on eBay
